title: Highest grossing Hollywood movies India 2019
yAxis: Box office gross in billion Indian rupees
summary: The Highest grossing Movie in the movies India was Movie The_Jungle_Book , who made 3.73 office .
The most grossing Movie was Fast_&_Furious_7 , with just 0.82 office .

In second place was Movie Avengers:_Infinity_War with 2.27 office ; third place went to Movie Avengers:_Endgame with 3.73 office ; fourth place went to Movie Jurassic_World:_Fallen_Kingdom with 0.82 office and fifth place went to Movie The_Lion_King , who was 1.58 office .
gold: Avengers : Endgame was all-time highest grossing Hollywood movie in India as of September 2019 . The top ten movies include genres that are loaded with action or are animated , similar to the trend in domestic movies . A dramatic consistency With an industry estimated to be valued at nearly 229 billion rupees by 2023 , it comes as no surprise that India 's film industry produced the largest number of movies .
